column5: I will be heading up to Lake of the Woods in a couple of weeks and was wondering how the fishing was. We'll be putting our boats in at Nester Falls and traveling to an Island called King's Island. Any suggestions on location or lures would be greatly appreciated.Thanks You

Guy from work came back last week and said the fishing was great. They used leaches on bottom bouncers, and they caught 30-40 a day each. Most around 18 inches. The weather was great. They fished the Southwest area of the lake. We will be up there in August.
